attributes.action: Instigate a total ban on lorries/trucks over 7.5tonnes on motorways/dual carriageways from 7-10am and 4-7pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lorries/trucks do nothing but block the flow of traffic on UK motorways. They take up 2 lanes for miles as they pitifully attempt to overtake other lorries travelling at the same speed!
It is obvious that they a major factor in causing crashes on the motorways. They must be banned from using them at peak times. The freight train service must be improved to accomodate the haulage required.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
